EmailTemplate.name: Welcome back
EmailTemplate.subject: Monday 22nd at ISM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
Please find attached a letter that will provide you with information on what to expect on the first day of school. Please do not hesitate to contact the Front Desk or myself directly if you have any questions.
Looking forward to seeing you all soon,
Kind regards,
Melissa Salter Head of Admissions The International School of Moscow
Direct: +7 (903) 722 1491 Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 Skype: ismadmissions www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group World Class Education
*Disclaimer:* This message (including any attachments) contains confidential information intended for a specific individual and purpose, and is protected by law. If you are not the intended recipient, you should delete this message and are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, or distribution of this message, or the taking of any action based on it, is strictly prohibited.
